T02D3402=D3306:67a-1: shr'i badzra a'a sa na s'a dha nam /
T02D3402=D3306:67a-3: dpal rdo rje gdan gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3402=D3306:67a-4: dpal rdo rje gdan la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3402=D3306:67a-5: yon tan tshogs kyi gzhir gyur gzhan don bla med de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3402=D3306:67a-6: dpal ldan rdo rje gdan zhes phun sum tshogs min 'joms shing 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa //
T02D3402=D3306:67a-7: gang zhig dul zhing zhi ba mchog gi sangs rgyas nyid kyi de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs gyur pa //
T02D3402=D3306:67a-8: sna tshogs kha dog gis spras brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02D3402=D3306:67a-9: de la mdun du 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas
T02D3402=D3306:67a-10: bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs
T02D3402=D3306:67a-11: pa dang ldan pa rnam par bsams te /
T02D3402=D3306:67a-12: me tog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:67a-13: aom na ma:aaksho bhy'a ya h'um /
T02D3402=D3306:67a-14: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67a-15: so sor lan gsum du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-0: aom na mo bee ro ts'a na ya aom aom badzra @67b pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-1: aom na mo ratna sam pha b'a ya tr'am /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-2: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-3: aom na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya hr'i:aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-4: aom na mo aa mo gha siddha ye aa:/
T02D3402=D3306:67b-5: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-6: aom na mo lo tsa n'a yee l'am /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-7: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-8: aom na mo m'a ma kee m'am /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-9: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-10: aom na ma:panda r'a yee pam /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-11: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-12: aom na ma:str'a r'a yee t'am /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-13: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-14: slar yang mi bskyod pa'i gzugs la sogs pas rdo
T02D3402=D3306:67b-15: rje gdan la mang zhing ches rab tu mang ba'i
T02D3402=D3306:67b-18: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-19: aom badzra gandhe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-20: aom badzra nee bi dye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-21: aom badzra d'i pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-22: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa'i cho ga byas
T02D3402=D3306:67b-23: nas byams pa la sogs pa bsgom pa sngon du
T02D3402=D3306:67b-24: 'gro bas so // de nas rang gi snying gar
T02D3402=D3306:67b-25: aa yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3402=D3306:67b-26: 'gro bas so // 'khor / de'i steng du h'um yig gser gyi kha dog lta bu /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-27: de las 'od zer 'phros pas bla ma dang /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bltas la /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-30: de nas khrus dang me tog la sogs pa mchod
T02D3402=D3306:67b-31: pa'i sprin rab tu 'phros pas yang dag par mchod
T02D3402=D3306:67b-32: do // de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-33: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-34: dge ba yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-35: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-36: rgyal ba'i lam la brten pa dang /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-37: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang bya ste /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-38: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-40: de nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-41: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-42: yi ge'i gzugs byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid blta bar bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-43: brtan par bya ba'i don du sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-44: aom sva bh'a wa shuddh'a:sarba dharma:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D3402=D3306:67b-45: de bzhin du 'od zer gyi gzugs yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-46: de'i steng du h'um gi yi ge la aa la
T02D3402=D3306:67b-47: sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug gis yongs su bskor
T02D3402=D3306:67b-48: ba'o // gzhan yang ka yig la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D3402=D3306:67b-49: thams cad kha dog dkar po ste /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-0: ma lus pa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi @68a * //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-2: de'i steng du h'um yig gi sa bon de yongs
T02D3402=D3306:68a-3: su gyur pa las rdo rje kha dog ser po'o
T02D3402=D3306:68a-4: // de la yang rdo rje'i lte ba la h'um yig go //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-5: de rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje gdan gyi sku gser gyi mdog lta bu'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-6: de'i gdan bdud rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-10: lha'i bu'i bdud rnams ser po dang /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-13: sngon po'i kha dog rnams rim pa ji lta ba
T02D3402=D3306:68a-14: bzhin du gzugs 'di rnams rnam par bsgom par bya'o
T02D3402=D3306:68a-15: // bdud 'di rnams kyis yongs su byas pa'i seng ge'i khri /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-16: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma dang rdo rje la
T02D3402=D3306:68a-17: bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
T02D3402=D3306:68a-18: rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-19: phyag g-yas pa sa gnon gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-20: g-yon pa gan rkyal du pang du bzhag pa'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-21: na bza' dmar po sku la bsnams pa zhi ba'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-22: de nas nga rgyal bskyed par bya ste /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-23: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sku mdog ser po /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-25: phyag gnyis pa ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-26: phyag g-yas pa na rin po che'i rnga yab bsnams pa /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-27: g-yon na klu shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-28: de bzhin du g-yon na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
T02D3402=D3306:68a-29: rten dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po phyag g-yas na
T02D3402=D3306:68a-30: rin po che'i rnga yab bsnams pa /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la blta zhing 'khod pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-33: de nas yan lag drug tu yi ge drug dgod par bya ste /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-34: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gnyis la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3402=D3306:68a-35: de'i steng du yi ge kshim kha dog dkar po'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-36: snyan gnyis la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dzr'im yig kha dog sngon po'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-37: shangs gnyis la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du kham yig kha dog ser po'o//
T02D3402=D3306:68a-38: ljags la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gam yig kha dog dmar po'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-39: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du kam yig kha dog ljang gu'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68a-40: nu ma'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3402=D3306:68a-41: du sam yig kha dog dkar po'o zhes bya ba
T02D3402=D3306:68a-42: ni yan lag drug la dgod pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D3402=D3306:68b-0: // de nas rang gi @68b snying gar zla ba'i
T02D3402=D3306:68b-1: dkyil 'khor la h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3402=D3306:68b-2: // rdo rje / de'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um yig go //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-3: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ye shes sems dpa' bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-4: spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom
T02D3402=D3306:68b-5: yig yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo kha dog
T02D3402=D3306:68b-6: dkar po / de'i dbus su zla ba la gnas
T02D3402=D3306:68b-7: pa'i aom yig ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D3402=D3306:68b-8: kyi sku rnam par dag pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-9: mgrin par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du a'a:yig
T02D3402=D3306:68b-10: yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa
T02D3402=D3306:68b-12: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D3402=D3306:68b-13: a'a:yig ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung
T02D3402=D3306:68b-14: rnam par dag pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-15: lte ba'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
T02D3402=D3306:68b-16: du h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje
T02D3402=D3306:68b-18: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D3402=D3306:68b-19: h'um yig ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
T02D3402=D3306:68b-20: rnam par dag par bsgom pa ste /
T02D3402=D3306:68b-21: sangs rgyas sgrub cing sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o zhes so //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-22: de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D3402=D3306:68b-23: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug nas
T02D3402=D3306:68b-24: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pa'i yi ge bzhis mdun du dgod
T02D3402=D3306:68b-25: par bya'o // de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang /
T02D3402=D3306:68b-26: bsang gtor rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-27: phyi nas 'o thug la sogs pa'i ston mo dbul
T02D3402=D3306:68b-28: bar bya'o zhes pa ni bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o
T02D3402=D3306:68b-30: sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-31: zhes pa'i bstod pa 'dis bstod par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-32: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang dam tshig sems dpa' gcig tu byas te /
T02D3402=D3306:68b-35: sa ma ya stvam aa ham aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-36: de nas bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-37: aom a'a:badzra h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3402=D3306:68b-38: phyi nas bsod nams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D3402=D3306:68b-39: chub tu bsngos nas gshegs su gsol te ji ltar
T02D3402=D3306:68b-41: bsod nams 'di yis sems can thams cad kyis de
T02D3402=D3306:68b-42: bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes myur du thob par gyur
T02D3402=D3306:68b-43: cig / rje btsun rdo rje gdan gyi sgrub thabs
